data.name: credits006
data.value:
特別感謝他們的貢獻與啟發
James Silva & Michelle Juett Greg Kasavin & Supergiant Games Derek Yu Edmund McMillen & Tommy Refenes Jonathan Blow & David Hellman Phil Fish & Renaud Bédard Twisted Pixel
Dean Dodrill 衷心感謝：
Microsoft Studios and the XBLA Team The XNA Development Community All of my generous Playtesters My wife, children and family And to an everloving God
HyperDuck SoundWorks 衷心感謝：
Their friends and family for all their support and understanding, Kevin Carville for his advice and feedback over the last year, Michael Carville for an amazing logo, and Dean, for being such an inspiration throughout this project, and a good friend.
Alex Kain 衷心感謝：
Mom, Dad, Jen, Care, Rachel, Sean, David, the Venan Crew, and all family and friends near and far.
Alex Brandon 衷心感謝：
For the love and patience of my family: Jeanette, Nicholas, Conner and Sean.
Toon Platoon Casting 特別感謝：
Jessie Thomson, Sunday Muse, Eric Schuran, Ryan "Frogs" McCormack Jeremy Harrington, Phillip Sacramento, Voice Acting Club & Alliance Tom Fulp and Newgrounds.com, The Samurai Pizza Cats
